items.sentence: Tom asked Mary what the weather had been like while he was away.
Tom said that he didn\'t have enough time to make his own lunch.
Tom spent three decades in prison for a crime he didn\'t commit.
I\'m supposed to stay after school and help clean the classroom.
I\'m tired of altering my plans every time you change your mind.
I\'m trying to get used to driving on the left side of the road.
We should just enjoy this and not worry about how much it costs.
How many years did it take you before you were fluent in French?
Last night was very hot and muggy and it was difficult to sleep.
Tom said he wanted to talk to you. Is that why you\'re here now?
